system.requirements: Any Human, RT Rank 1+. Fellowship 35+, Willpower 35+, Must have spent time studying the teachings of Nadine Aleynikov and minstering to the afflicted of the Koronus Expanse.

description.value:
Those who spread the message of famed missionary Nadine Aleynikov, known for their trails and tribulations to cure a plague that ultimately claimed them. Those of the faith perservere to learn fieldcraft and medicine, honing research skills such they may to cure others.

Effects: Replace new Rank's Advances with that of the Adherent of Aleynikov Allows for the purchasing of the Unique Talent Faith Healing
